## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d6305ceedc8783931c768a5e9310ed0fa44beddd11c0d9d0f192d012bc02edc6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'automated-native-creatives' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
